content:
The signature dish of the Southern United States is arguably fried chicken. For the most authentic version of this dish, you can try:
- Gus's World Famous Fried Chicken in Memphis, Tennessee
- Prince's Hot Chicken Shack in Nashville, Tennessee
- Mary Mac's Tea Room in Atlanta, Georgia
- Willie Mae's Scotch House in New Orleans, Louisiana
- Hattie B's Hot Chicken in Nashville and Memphis, Tennessee 

These restaurants are famous for their crispy, juicy fried chicken that is commonly served with traditional Southern sides such as mashed potatoes, collard greens, and mac and cheese.
